message.body: Free ATT Msg: Your bill is past due. Reply 1 to pay balance of $717.56 now or 2 to pay past due of $309.66 now using bank acct ending in 7029.
Do you know anything about this
I'll pay it online and make sure it is correct
It doesn't sound right. I thought we had solved all that
Looks like we have to call them again and discuss.
It should be 250 per month not 360
I think we have to account for the Italy charges. I just remembered I need to call and cancel whatever plan she had for the trip. But if anything it was about $5 per month.
Yea we have to look at it again. $100 seems too much for the Italy charges,
